languages.text: "Зовешь то, что было между нами, ложью? Ну и болван. Может, начал ты это и по приказу, но не лги, что не начал испытывать ко мне чувства в процессе его выполнения".
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."
languages.original_text: "Зовешь то, что было между нами, ложью? Ну и болван. Может, начал ты это и по приказу, но не лги, что не начал испытывать ко мне чувства в процессе его выполнения".

traits.locale_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? Don't make a fool of yourself. Maybe you really were following orders at the start, but don't lie about never developing real feelings for me."
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? Don't make a fool of yourself. Maybe you really were following orders at the start, but don't lie about never developing real feelings for me."
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."
"Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちの間にあったものは全部嘘だったのか？自分を笑い者にしているぞ。最初は命令で動いてただけかもしれない。だが、本気の気持ちが一度もなかったなんて言わせない」
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちの間にあったものは全部嘘だったのか？自分を笑い者にしているぞ。最初は命令で動いてただけかもしれない。だが、本気の気持ちが一度もなかったなんて言わせない」

languages.text: "Alles zwischen uns war eine Lüge, nicht wahr? Ihr macht Euch lächerlich. Anfangs habt Ihr vielleicht nur Befehle befolgt, aber erzählt mir nicht, dass Ihr keine echten Gefühle für mich entwickelt hättet."
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: "Alles zwischen uns war eine Lüge, nicht wahr? Ihr macht Euch lächerlich. Anfangs habt Ihr vielleicht nur Befehle befolgt, aber erzählt mir nicht, dass Ihr keine echten Gefühle für mich entwickelt hättet."

languages.text: « Tout ce qui s'est passé entre nous était un mensonge, alors ? Ne soyez pas ridicule. Même si vous vous contentiez de suivre vos ordres au départ, vous ne me ferez pas croire que vous n'avez jamais rien ressenti pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce qui s'est passé entre nous était un mensonge, alors ? Ne soyez pas ridicule. Même si vous vous contentiez de suivre vos ordres au départ, vous ne me ferez pas croire que vous n'avez jamais rien ressenti pour moi. »

languages.text: «Conque todo lo que había entre nosotros era mentira, ¿eh? No sea ridículo. Puede que al principio estuviese cumpliendo órdenes, pero no pretenda hacerme creer que no ha terminado albergando sentimientos reales hacia mí».
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: «Conque todo lo que había entre nosotros era mentira, ¿eh? No sea ridículo. Puede que al principio estuviese cumpliendo órdenes, pero no pretenda hacerme creer que no ha terminado albergando sentimientos reales hacia mí».

languages.text: “我们之间的一切都是谎言，真的吗？你这是在自欺欺人。或许你一开始确实只是在服从命令，但别说什么你从没有对我产生过真正的感情。”
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: “我们之间的一切都是谎言，真的吗？你这是在自欺欺人。或许你一开始确实只是在服从命令，但别说什么你从没有对我产生过真正的感情。”

languages.text: "Aramızdaki her şey yalan mıydı? Kendini aptal durumuna düşürüyorsun. Belki başlangıçta sadece emirlere uyuyordun ama bana herhangi bir his beslemediğini söylemeye kalkma."
languages.original_text: "Everything between us was a lie, was it? You're making a fool of yourself. Maybe you were just following orders at the start, but don't try to tell me you never developed real feelings for me."

traits.locale_text: "Aramızdaki her şey yalan mıydı? Kendini aptal durumuna düşürüyorsun. Belki başlangıçta sadece emirlere uyuyordun ama bana herhangi bir his beslemediğini söylemeye kalkma."
